channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report I-2023080001
item.description:
Report I-2023080001

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-30T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-01
  • City: Honolulu
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DELTA AIR LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Delta received notification on 07/02/23 of an undeclared event where after off loading a metal tool chest, several aerosol containers(i.e. WD-40) were found inside(see pictures). Preliminary investigation has revealed that the tool-chest was screened by K9. Flight#: DL837 Date: 07/01/2023 AWB: 006-75330942 The event is under investigation to determine root cause and subsequent corrective actions. See the attached pictures.
